Texto: 
retrotympanic mass seen on right.
surgery
enhancing mass with bony erosion involving the middle ear cavity with extension into the jugular foramen.
glomus tumor, paraganglioma, chemodectoma
• glomus tumor
• metastatic disease
• malignant otitis 
• meningioma
51 year old man with right sided hearing loss and pain
this lesion has features of both a glomus tympanicum and glomus jugulare tumor as it involves both the middle ear cavity and jugular foramen.
